document.full_text: for many serbs, who are struggling with a very weak economy and high joblessness rates of some 20 percent, the arrest of ratko mladic is an ambivalent, even irrelevant moment for their near future.
document.title: arrest follows serbia's uneven path to break with its past
lines_and_colors: for many serbs, who are struggling with a very weak economy and high joblessness rates of some 20 percent, the arrest of ratko mladic is an ambivalent, even irrelevant moment for their near future.
